name: Winter Memories (itch)
description:
Tricia, an adventurous young girl, lost the love of her life. On the winter solstice of every year, she goes to visit his grave. But, this year - she is met with a nasty surprise! What is this nasty surprise, and how will Tricia deal with it?! Play to find out! WARNING: Strong language, mention of death.

This is the very first game I ever completed/released. It's just a simple puzzle game (with some battles thrown in). I hope you enjoy~
